Class VisualTileHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • VisualTileHolder

  • public class VisualTileHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a generic representation of a front-end tile container. It is responsible for drawing itself and the tiles it contains. It should also translate mouse coordinates to slot IDs... -AC

    • Method Summary

      Draws all tiles to screen.

      • getSlotFromClick

        public int getSlotFromClick(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Get the slot ID from a mouse click. We need the slot ID to perform swaps between slots when drags are successful. -AC

      • getTileImageFromClick

        public java.awt.Image getTileImageFromClick(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Returns the image from tile at location specified by MouseEvent -MG
        Parameters:
        e - MouseEvent
        Returns:
        Image of tile at location in e or null if no tile present

      • getRotationFromClick

        public int getRotationFromClick(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Returns the rotation of tile at location specified by MouseEvent -MG
        Parameters:
        e - MouseEvent
        Returns:
        Rotation of tile represented as number of 90 degree clockwise rotations or -1 if no tile present

        Rotates tile 90 degrees clockwise -MG
